tool.name: Johnson-Charniak Parser
tool.description: Parse the sentence using JC Parser

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a suitable input file from your history

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

configfiles.configfile: import sys import os import nltk inp = sys.argv[1] outp = sys.argv[2] from nltk.corpus import PlaintextCorpusReader corpus = PlaintextCorpusReader(os.path.dirname(inp),os.path.basename(inp)) sents = corpus.sents() parser = nltk.parse.johnsoncharniak.JohnsonCharniak() o = open(outp,'w') for item in sents: tree = parser.parse(item) print >> o, tree.pprint() o.close()

tool.help: Parse the sentence using JC Parser
